Build next generation healthcare apps

PaaS for rapid prototyping and development of healthcare apps based on FHIR standard

AppaDrome

FHIRbase provides developers with a storage to develop Health IT solutions such as EHRs, patient and physician portals, etc.
FHIRbase is designed in accordance with the FHIR standard.

3 Steps to the Healthcare App




Step 1

Sign Up and Create Instance


Step 2

Clone Sample App and Develop


Step 3

Deploy your App and Demonstrate

Features


Storage for Healthcare Data with RESTful API

FHIR standard gives specific directions for exchanging structured medical data and FHIRbase is developed to easily store and retrieve medical data in the FHIR format.


User Management App

FHIR standard gives specific directions for exchanging structured medical data and FHIRbase is developed to easily store and retrieve medical data in the FHIR format.


Web Infrastructure

FHIR standard gives specific directions for exchanging structured medical data and FHIRbase is developed to easily store and retrieve medical data in the FHIR format.

Pricing

A simple and straightforward API gives developers ability to use accustomed languages and platforms, such as Java, Node.js, .NET, Ruby, etc., to interact with FHIRbase.
